name: Thrills & Chills - Roller Coasters
description:
Forget about other roller-coasters rides and experience real Thrills & Chills with this Virtual Reality coaster.
Continuously updated with new tracks and environments, this is a must have for every roller coaster fan!Key Features:
  • Multiple tracks above the rooftops of a large and realistic city
  • Feel the wind in your bones
  • Innovative track design
  • Starts with 1 Environment with 3 Tracks, more content will be added with future updates
  • The community decides what will developed next!


This experience was created as a cooperation by VRisch and Black Cell.
Both are independent studios known for their focus on great atmosphere and immersion.
